definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels

sentences.english: None of this will actually be decided at Bali.
sentences.chinese: 所有這一切實際上都決定在巴里島。

sentences.english: This forum is provided for travelers planning to visit Bali.
sentences.chinese: 本討論區係爲準備到巴里島旅遊之遊客所設置。

sentences.english: And this family do just like what Balinese does.
sentences.chinese: 這家人就像巴里島是否。

sentences.english: Balinese hospitality of our staff will make your holiday unforgettable.
sentences.chinese: 巴里島的款待，我們的工作人員將讓您難忘的假期。

sentences.english: You wanna dance on a beach in Bali?
sentences.chinese: 你想去巴里島的白色沙灘？

sentences.english: Is a Balinese the Breed for You?
sentences.chinese: 是巴里島的品種更適合你？

definition: Cebu, a province (and a city) in the Philippines (Tw)
Vladivostok/Ming and Qing name for Vladivostok 符拉迪沃斯托克 and the province around it
a hot tourist attraction/a tourist trap
Tokyo Bay/former name of 北部灣|北部湾[Bei3 bu4 Wan1], Gulf of Tonkin
Calgary, largest city of Alberta, Canada
Nauru, island country in the southwestern Pacific (Tw)
